titleStmt.title: A commemoration sermon: or, A discourse on II Cor. V.I. Occasioned by the death of a most religious young lady Mary Hampson the onely daughter of Sir Thomas Hampson, of Taplow, in Bucks, ... who died August the 14. 1677. Together with a relation of her incomparable and exemplary life.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.D. for Henry Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped and stained, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
